text: Ajay Singh Dharmendra Deol, better known as Sunny Deol is an Indian actor and politician. He has been in over 90 Hindi movies. He has also been the Member of Parliment in the Lok Sabha for the Gurdaspur constituency since 2019. == Awards == Deol has won two National Film Awards and two Filmfare awards. ==References== Category:Members of the Lok Sabha Category:Indian movie actors Category:People from Punjab, India Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Sunny Deol
